summary: The diff implements the requested red alarm-style feedback for the "No" button on the Valentine Question screen, including repeatable state-driven styling, a shake animation, and a brief red flash overlay, with Tailwind keyframes/animations added. No missing core requirements are evident. Some repo bookkeeping/state files were modified that were not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/summary file describing multiple app screens and gift features (not part of the requested "No" alarm feedback change).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for UI behavior/CSS changes for the "No" button alarm effect; updating a broad frontend file summary isn’t requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state file (project_state.json) to add/track feature requests AR-1/AR-2/AR-3.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to project management/state JSON; it’s unrelated to implementing the UI behavior itself.
